query: Could you propose a one-week travel itinerary for 4 people, leaving from Seattle and heading to Florida from March 17th to March 23rd, 2022? We plan to visit 3 different cities in Florida. Our budget is set at $14,700. We require accommodations that allow parties, and we prefer to rent entire rooms. We also would prefer to avoid driving ourselves during this trip.
goal: Trip from Seattle to Florida; start date: 2022-03-17; duration: 7 day(s); budget: $14700; people: 1; city count target: 3; preferences: parties, entire room; must cities: None; priority cities: None
actions: choose_city_bundle:[Orlando,Miami,Tampa]
